items.title: Генератор трека в стиле DnB (Suno)
items.summary: Создание Drum & Bass трека с параметрами ритма, темпа и атмосферы.
items.prompt_text: Create a Drum & Bass track with fast-paced rhythm, punchy drums and rolling bassline. Theme: {theme}. Mood: {mood}. BPM: {bpm}. Vocal style: {vocal}.

items.title: Liquid DnB Atmospheres (Suno)
items.summary: Создание мягкого лиричного Liquid DnB трека.
items.prompt_text: Generate a Liquid Drum & Bass track with warm pads, soft breaks, emotional melodies. Theme: {theme}. Mood: {mood}. Vocals: {vocals}.

items.title: Rock Ballad Generator
items.prompt_text: Compose a powerful rock ballad with emotional vocals, wide guitars and dramatic progression. Theme: {theme}. Vocal tone: {tone}. Instrument focus: {instrument}.

items.title: Electronic Dance Track Creator
items.summary: Создание EDM трека с танцевальной структурой.
items.prompt_text: Create an energetic electronic dance track with festival-style drop. Theme: {theme}. BPM: {bpm}. Energy level: {energy}.

items.title: Retro Vibe Synthwave Creator
items.prompt_text: Create a retro synthwave track with neon pads, analog synths and 80s drums. Theme: {theme}. Mood: {mood}.

items.title: Samba Latin Groove Maker
items.prompt_text: Compose a samba track with Brazilian percussion, acoustic guitars and lively rhythms. Theme: {theme}. Tempo: {tempo}.

items.title: Sport Motivation Anthem
items.prompt_text: Generate an energetic workout anthem with powerful drums and motivational vibe. Mood: {mood}. BPM: {bpm}.

items.title: Epic Viral Character Creator
items.prompt_text: Создай вирального персонажа с уникальной внешностью, поведением и фразами. Опиши: стиль, слабость, сильную сторону, мемность, подходящие сюжеты контента. Тема: {theme}.

items.title: Creative Writer Booster
items.prompt_text: Сгенерируй литературный текст в стиле {style} на тему {theme}. Добавь образность, динамику, эмоциональные сцены и уникальные образы.

items.title: SORA Video: Cat Action Scene
items.summary: Генерация видеосцены с котом, выполняющим приёмы.
items.prompt_text: A realistic scene where a small cat performs martial arts moves, strikes an object and breaks it. High realism, correct physics, dramatic timing. Scene theme: {theme}.

items.title: SORA Doorbell Camera Shock Scene
items.summary: Сцена неожиданности с выходом героя к сюрпризу во дворе.
items.prompt_text: A static doorbell-camera shot. The door opens and @{nickname} steps outside to see a giant mechanical creature in the yard. Hyperreal, dynamic destruction. Replace @{nickname} with a SORA cameo name.

items.title: SORA: Flying Sports Cinematic
items.prompt_text: Create a cinematic slow-motion sports sequence highlighting movement, strength and emotion. Scene type: {type}. Atmosphere: {mood}.

items.title: Rock Style Lyrics Generator
items.prompt_text: Write rock lyrics in the style of {style}. Theme: {theme}. Emotional tone: {tone}. Add metaphors and expressive imagery.

items.title: Cute Cat Story Creator
items.prompt_text: Напиши короткую историю про кота. Задай характер: {характер}. Событие: {событие}. Атмосфера: {атмосфера}.

items.title: Retro Video Aesthetic Prompt
items.prompt_text: Generate a retro-style video with VHS textures, low saturation, analog noise and 80s atmosphere. Theme: {theme}.

items.title: Writer's Block Destroyer
items.prompt_text: Дай 10 идей для начала текста в стиле {стиль} на тему {тема}. Укажи возможные сюжетные ходы.

items.title: SORA: Viral Supermarket Scene
items.prompt_text: A comedic realistic supermarket scene where a person behaves unexpectedly. Scene theme: {theme}. Motion: natural, detailed.

items.title: Epic Sports Motivation Script
items.prompt_text: Write a motivational sports monologue with emotional rise, metaphors and intensity. Sport: {sport}. Tone: {tone}.

items.title: Samba Dance Visualization
items.prompt_text: Create a vibrant samba dance visual with rhythmic movement, colorful outfits and dynamic camera. Mood: {mood}.

items.title: EDM Drop Generator
items.prompt_text: Generate 5 unique concepts for a powerful EDM drop. Describe rhythm, synths and mood. Theme: {theme}.

items.title: Rock Guitar Riff Designer
items.prompt_text: Design five rock guitar riff concepts. Include tempo, feel, technique and mood.

items.title: Sport Nutrition Mini-Guide
items.prompt_text: Создай мини-гайд по спортивному питанию для цели: {цель}. Опиши: режим, продукты, ошибки.

items.title: Retro 8-bit Music Creator
items.prompt_text: Generate 8-bit chiptune music with nostalgic mood and game-style melodies. Theme: {theme}.

items.title: Fantasy Writer Worldbuilder
items.prompt_text: Создай фэнтези-мир: география, культура, магия, конфликты. Тема: {тема}.

items.title: Viral TikTok Concept Generator
items.prompt_text: Create 10 viral TikTok concepts based on trend: {trend}. Include hook, twist and visual style.

items.title: Sport Commercial Script
items.prompt_text: Write a 20-second sport commercial script with emotional arc. Product: {product}. Audience: {audience}.

items.title: Cute Cat Animation Concept
items.prompt_text: Design a short animation concept about a cute cat. Theme: {theme}. Tone: {tone}.

items.title: SORA: High-Energy Action Scene
items.prompt_text: Generate a high-energy action sequence with dynamic camera, debris movement and cinematic lighting. Theme: {theme}.
